mapper.sql: seq_id, pool_name, proxy_type, ip, port, is_valid, user_name, passwd, remark, input_by, input_time, updator, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT c.exchange_id, c.grab_interval_time, c.ip_unfreeze_time, i.proxy_type, i.ip, i.pool_name, i.port, i.user_name, i.passwd, i.input_time FROM exchange_grab_conf c LEFT JOIN ip_pool i ON c.proxy_type = i.proxy_type where c.is_valid = 1 and i.is_valid = 1 ORDER BY exchange_id
mapper.insert: insert into ip_pool (seq_id, pool_name, proxy_type, ip, port, is_valid, user_name, passwd, remark, input_by, input_time, updator, update_time) values (#{seqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{poolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proxyType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isValid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into ip_pool
seq_id,
pool_name,
proxy_type,
ip,
port,
is_valid,
user_name,
passwd,
remark,
input_by,
input_time,
updator,
update_time,

mapper.update:
update ip_pool
pool_name = #{poolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proxy_type = #{proxyType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
port = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
passwd = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
input_by = #{inputBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
input_time = #{inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where seq_id = #{seqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ip_pool set pool_name = #{poolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proxy_type = #{proxyType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passwd = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, input_by = #{inputBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, input_time = #{inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where seq_id = #{seqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
